work_experience.description: I am working as a part of the scrum team on my own project. The project includes converting Javascript-files to Typescript, replacing larg part of the Material UI with Ag Grid and updating code when necessary. In the project I am using React.js, PHP and  MySQL.

I started at Nordea working as a financial advisor in the callcenter. In February 2020 I continued my career development  working as an entrepreneur advisor. After almost a year working closely with business customers I wanted to see the work from another perspective and got a position in KYC Services as an AML & Sanctions Processing Specialist and team leader trainee.
I worked with individuals and groups as a PT and physiotherapist. My specialities are weightlifting, bodyweight training and preventive physiotherapy
I worked in the reception and managed the accounting offices invoicing. I also did some accounting and account receivables for the customers.

Buutti Oy.description: Education part of the recruitment program. In the education part I had recap of the techniques such as React Vite, Javascript, Typescript, Node, HTML, CSS, MySQL and testing with Jest. I also got to learn new skills such as Docker, Azure (App Services with and without Docker and Database Services with PostgreSQL Server and Node application) and GitLab CI/CD

Brainnest.description: In the training I had a recap on HTML, CSS and Javascript.

Savonia Code Academy.description: In the Code Academy I learned the basics of Fullstack Development. The techniques mostly used were HTML, CSS, C#, Javascript, Typescript, React.js, Node.js and MySQL. We also had a small introduction to Azure and AWS.
